group_1.textRight: So the world will end in three days...
But if someone says the words "The End,"@it will end immediately.

group_1.textLeft: ...What a strange dream.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
The dream itself was going over...
...the things that had actually happened during@those three days,
but many details were changed.
For example, people were saying things like,@"Even though the end of the world is here,"
"we can all work together to make it a happy one!"
They were also talking about things@that are impossible in reality.

group_1.textLeft: What would happen if someone actually said@"The End"...?

group_1.textRight: Considering it's a dream caused by a Witch,@it can't be anything good.
Perhaps the dream would become a nightmare@and shatter the victim's mind.
That would very well be the end of their world.

group_1.textLeft: Did Kyoko and the other girls appear@in the dream?

group_1.textRight: That's right, they did!
When my dream got to yesterday, they were@all there when I ran into Ren and the others.

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh... when we came across the kitten...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah![chara:303050:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303050:cheek_0][chara:303050:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303050:lipSynch_1]@...Oh, but...
Kyoko's sister was in the dream, too...@But I'm positive we've never met.

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: Her name was Momo.

group_1.textLeft: Um... Miss Haruna...
Did Kyoko ever tell you about her sister?

group_1.textRight: No. That's why it was so strange.

group_1.textLeft: (...Even in this timeline,)
(it sounds like Kyoko hasn't told anyone@about her family.)
(Even so, her sister appeared@in Miss Haruna's dream...?)

group_1.textRight: Oh, and there was one other thing that stood out...
In my dream, Ren was the only person@who couldn't see Momo.
Like...from what I remember,
you said something about Momo@looking like a doll...

group_1.textLeft: Do you have any idea what that could mean,@Ren...?

group_1.textRight: I...haven't...had that dream, so...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right...@You didn't go into the Labyrinth.

group_1.textRight: ...Going back to Kyoko's sister,
was there anyone else who recognized her@in the dream?
Yeah, there was Kyoko, Rika, Sana...
...and me and that girl we met?

group_1.textLeft: ...And all of them are still trapped@in the Labyrinth.
All of them recognize Kyoko's sister,@even though they've never met.

group_1.textRight: Are they and Kyoko...@sharing the same dream?

group_1.textLeft: I can't be sure...@But it's possible.
It may be Kyoko who's at the center of all this...

group_1.textCenter: ...Here we are!@I'm sorry we're so late!

group_1.textRight: You said everyone's trapped@in a Labyrinth?

group_1.textLeft: Seems like the case, yeah.

group_1.textRight: I haven't been able to get in touch with Sana...@So I think you must be right.
...I...can't bear waiting any longer...but...

group_1.textLeft: If we just run in blindly,
we'll only have even more victims on our plate.

group_1.textRight: Still, it's hard to figure out@what we're supposed to do...

group_1.textCenter: She's asking if there's anything she can do@to help.

group_1.textLeft: I'm pretty sure that Kagome...
...is with Nagisa right now, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I think they're in Kazamino City.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Why Kazamino?

group_1.textRight: ...From what I heard,
Nagisa is taking over patrolling@Kazamino City today.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, that must've been what she meant when@she said she had something she needed to do...
...That's right! We should try getting in touch@with them.
I have a favor I need to ask of them.

group_1.textRight: You mean Nagisa and Kagome?

group_1.textLeft: Correct.
You must have some plan in mind.

group_1.textRight: I do. We need to try everything we can.
I'll ask Yachiyo and the others for help, too!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Iroha!
Kyoko... Everyone...@Please be safe!
